.. index:: MachineInteger

.. _l4d616368696e65496e7465676572:

MachineInteger
==============

:viewcode:`fortmac.spad line 1 <fortmac.spad#L1>` :editcode:`[edit on github] <fortmac.spad#L1>`


A domain which models the integer representation used by machines in the AXIOM-NAG link.


.. _l4d616368696e65496e7465676572-30:
